item.title: Battle Standard of Healing
item.fluff: This white flag is emblazoned with sigils of healing that restore the vitality of your and your allies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You plant the battle standard in your space or an adjacent square, and the standard creates a zone of healing energy in a close burst 5. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter, or any creature uses a standard action to remove the battle standard from the ground.
Whenever you or an ally spends a healing surge to regain hit points while in the zone, that creature regains 1 additional hit point and you and other allies regain 1 hit point.

item.title: Battle Standard of Honor
item.fluff: This blood-red banner weakens the resolve of those who fight against you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You plant the battle standard in your space or an adjacent square, and the standard creates a zone of protective energy in a close burst 5. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter, or any creature uses a standard action to remove the battle standard from the ground.
Enemies in the zone that are marked take a penalty to damage rolls against any creature other than the one that marked them. The penalty equals -1.

item.title: Battle Standard of Might
item.fluff: This flag is marked with martial runes that inspire strength in you and your allies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You plant the battle standard in your space or an adjacent square, and the standard creates a zone of protective energy in a close burst 5. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter, or any creature uses a standard action to remove the battle standard from the ground.
While within the zone, you and your allies gain a +1 power bonus to damage rolls.

item.title: Battle Standard of the Hungry Blade
item.fluff: This black pennant bears the symbol of the hungry blade: an axe head with a toothy maw that resembles the silhouette of a dragon's head

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You plant the battle standard in your space or an adjacent square, and the standard creates a zone of arcane energy in a close burst 3. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter, or any creature uses a standard action to remove the battle standard from the ground. Removing this battle standard provokes an opportunity attack.
Enemies in the zone when it is created or within the zone at the start of your turn are pulled 2 squares toward the battle standard and slowed until the start of your next turn.
